title: 820-2936 No Backlight
message:
Hey all, have a water damaged board that has no backlight. There wasn't any corrosion or red pads when I got it, and it doesn't look like anyone has tried working on it. I verified that there's a display, just no backlight.

F9700 was blown, so I replaced it, and now get a green light but no power. I'm getting a short to ground somewhere along the line now.

If I remove R0910, since it's before the BKL_EN line for U9701 but doesn't remove BKL_EN, it powers on just fine. But that means that it'll boot when I kill PPBUS_SW_BKL. All the caps seem to be fine from there to the LCD connector J9000, but something is obviously shorting. What is the SW0 and SW1 do?

title: 820-2936 No Backlight
message: I take it back. Tested a new LCD and LCD Cable and SHUBAAAM backlight and image. Guess it's that simple.
